sentences.english: Their DNA was also loosening up and making memory genes more active.
sentences.chinese: 它們的DNA也鬆開了，使記憶體基因更加活躍。

sentences.english: Could not allocate memory for a macro table.
sentences.chinese: 此巨集無法配置記憶體。

sentences.english: All requests for image data are filled from the memory store.
sentences.chinese: 會由記憶體存放區填滿所有影像資料要求。

sentences.english: This number is cleared to zero each time a generation-zero garbage collection occurs.
sentences.chinese: 每當發生層代零的記憶體回收時，這個數目便歸零。

sentences.english: Please install this software to the Device Memory.
sentences.chinese: 請安裝本軟體至手機主記憶體位置。

sentences.english: This there can be flash- memory, plates from the long-lived material and so on.
sentences.chinese: 這可以有快閃記憶體，板從長壽命材料等。

sentences.english: In other words, they’ve created a form of quantum memory.
sentences.chinese: 換句話說，他們已經制造出了一種量子記憶體。

sentences.english: Requests that the host allocate the requested amount of memory from the heap, and additionally track where the memory was allocated.
sentences.chinese: 要求主應用程式從堆積中配置所要求數量的記憶體。

sentences.english: Create in-memory schemas using strongly typed classes.
sentences.chinese: 使用強型別類別建立記憶體中的結構描述。

sentences.english: Gets a pointer to an ICorDebugRegisterSet that represents the register set for this ICorDebugNativeFrame .
sentences.chinese: 的指標，表示存放在指定記憶體位址的區域變數值。

sentences.english: Each program had to occupy a single contiguous block of storage locations.
sentences.chinese: 程式載入主記憶體內，它必須佔有連續地址的記憶體。

sentences.english: Each program had to occupy a single contiguous block of storage locations.
sentences.chinese: 程式載入主記憶體內，它必須佔有連續地址的記憶體。

sentences.english: Creates a memory store for requested data only.
sentences.chinese: 只建立所要求資料的記憶體存放區。

sentences.english: Control whether concurrent garbage collection or non-concurrent garbage collection is done.
sentences.chinese: 控制是否完成了並行或非並行的記憶體回收。

sentences.english: The program encountered an unexpected error while performing a memory-management operation.
sentences.chinese: 當程式執行記憶體管理作業時，遇到未預期的錯誤。

definition: to store up/to stockpile/(computer) to save/to store/memory/storage
